headline: Why Ralph Lauren (RL) Dipped More Than Broader Market Today

headline: How Ralph Lauren Plans To Expand Its Luxury Empire
summary: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) outlined new three-year targets calling for mid-single-digit sales growth and 100–150 basis points of operating margin expansion, with management emphasizing that its 16% margin outlook is not a ceiling. The company expects growth to be fueled by continued strength in Asia and Europe, alongside incremental gains from women's apparel, handbags, and a broader store footprint across APAC and EMEA. headline: Ralph Lauren Executes Its Core Priorities, Outlines Long-Term View

headline: Ralph Lauren shares strategic growth plan, long-term outlook
summary: US fashion brand Ralph Lauren has disclosed its strategic growth plan, which aims to achieve sustainable growth and value creation over the long term.

headline: Apparel and Accessories Stocks Q2 In Review: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) Vs Peers
summary: As the Q2 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the apparel and accessories industry, including Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) and its peers.
